oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: An old sorceress (a relative who befriended the narrator’s family), her power of turning herself into a lioness, her pet springbok, etc. By Dia!kwãin (L V.
4743). Dia!kwain's aunt, the sorceress Ttanno !khauken, changes herself into a lioness to see what her people are doing and to take care of them. Dia!kwain's father kills her short
horned springbok, but she is not angry even though it is not a food springbok, but a tame one (it was her 'heart's springbok').
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Bushman doctress and sorceress Ttanno !khauken
